name: Lost Legacies in the Sand
title: Lost Legacies in the Sand
desc: "Children of the desert, cling no longer to past grievances. But hold tight to the memory of this act of benevolence..."

skills.desc:
Select one of the following:
Place 1 card with the highest cost from your opponent's Hand at the bottom of their deck.
Or
Place all cards from your Hand at the bottom of your deck and then draw the same number of cards plus 1.
